name: Pickling with Barb
event: Come join Barbra the town pickler at the pickle shed for an evening of pickling suprises

name: Invention of the telegraph
event: I, Samuel Morse, Have finally created a means of communication that will change the world.

name: Event Horizon
event: The final day of man, let all we have known be swallowed into the abyss(MAXIMUM EDGE)
